data.actual_result: The name isn't truncated with 3 dots. The file name just gets cut off/ the other characters just vanish.
data.expected_result: The name gets truncated with 3 dots.
data.short_description: Files with long names don't get truncated with 3 dots in the add content menu. The characters just get cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the add content (+) button. - Click on the file selection tab. - Scroll down until you see a long file name (make sure that you at least have one).
